title: Advances in erythritol-based composite phase change materials
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1389-1404
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00171K, Review Article
Fuyan Peng, Xuhai Zhu, Rongjun Lin, Rui Lu, Fang Lu
Erythritol-based composite phase change materials (PCMs) can realize energy absorption, storage, and release by the phase change latent heat, which is beneficial for heat energy management.
